subs.text: June 29

Carrying and giving birth to a child is difficult, dangerous, and even traumatic. Carrying the child of one's abuser after rape or incest is akin to psychological abuse. Certain medical conditions can lead to a woman's death early or late in pregnancy or after giving birth.
subs.rawText: Carrying and giving birth to a child is difficult, dangerous, and even traumatic. Carrying the child of one's abuser after rape or incest is akin to psychological abuse. Certain medical conditions can lead to a woman's death early or late in pregnancy or after giving birth.

subs.text: In Indiana, the gerrymandered GOP Statehouse supermajority is said to be considering denying women those three reasons for abortion. If so, they'd be saying that they'd like women to face those risks without having any choice of terminating pregnancy.
subs.rawText: In Indiana, the gerrymandered GOP Statehouse supermajority is said to be considering denying women those three reasons for abortion. If so, they'd be saying that they'd like women to face those risks without having any choice of terminating pregnancy.

subs.text: The gerrymandered supermajority means that the Indiana GOP will likely make its decision without even conversing with Democratic lawmakers, and probably without public hearings. They would consider themselves wise enough to make these life-and-death judgments for others.
subs.rawText: The gerrymandered supermajority means that the Indiana GOP will likely make its decision without even conversing with Democratic lawmakers, and probably without public hearings. They would consider themselves wise enough to make these life-and-death judgments for others.

subs.text: Parallel to the collapse of Iron Curtain countries. Corruption goes on and on, but is finally challenged in a way that is visible to a wide audience, people start to know that everyone knows, and the usual institutions decide not to bail out the corrupt leadership as in the past. [link]

subs.text: Gorbachev made clear that the Soviet army would not come into Czechoslovakia to bail out the flailing hard-liner Communist government, and larger and larger groups of people, hundreds of thousands, were gathering to protest. The facade was crumbling.

subs.text: It takes real staying power, master of public discourse, to challenge the illusions of entrenched power, but corruption presents a shell, an illusion, a facade, and it can be undermined by widespread public knowledge. IF THAT can be achieved.

subs.text: The January 6th Committee has refused to play a fair number of the stupid games that our media are accustomed to broadcasting. Detailed presentations, at length, well-crafted, two or three times a week to keep in the public eye, mounting in power of the accusations (I'd say).
subs.rawText: The January 6th Committee has refused to play a fair number of the stupid games that our media are accustomed to broadcasting. Detailed presentations, at length, well-crafted, two or three times a week to keep in the public eye, mounting in power of the accusations (I'd say).

subs.text:
It's as if the committee had never heard of sound bites. And yet they lace the presentations with those too.

Will they succeed? Who knows. But they play a smart game.

And yes, for crooks, it's the spotlight that bothers them, not the crime. They got over the crime long ago.

subs.text: Writers often use commonplace books to record quotations that they may want to come back to someday and build on. For writers who don't have much of an audience on Twitter, Twitter itself acts like an easy-to-write-in but not-easy-to-read-later commonplace book. So, not so good.

subs.text: June 3

As the story goes, a family friend, when she was maybe ten, saw Fr. Hesburgh on the @NotreDame campus, approached him and said, “Father, thank you for making Notre Dame co-ed,” and he replied, “Somebody had to do it. It was like a locker room around this place.”

subs.text: If you rent enough rooms, a venue puts your name up in lights. In Orlando, we all walked into a wide dining room. One long wall was a kelpy aquarium where Disney scuba divers held “Welcome AGLSP” signs, finny beings swam by on all levels, and bubbles wobbled up and out of sight.

subs.text: Since mass shooters often leave torturous manifestos or computers filled with wretched political content related to the shooting, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the shooting. It is already political.
subs.rawText: Since mass shooters often leave torturous manifestos or computers filled with wretched political content related to the shooting, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the shooting. It is already political.

subs.text: Since the access to weapons is shaped by public policy and political action over many years, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the mass shooting. It is already political.
subs.rawText: Since the access to weapons is shaped by public policy and political action over many years, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the mass shooting. It is already political.

subs.text: Since victims of a mass shooting were entitled to their lives and liberty, which are rights won through political struggle, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the mass shooting. It is already political.
subs.rawText: Since victims of a mass shooting were entitled to their lives and liberty, which are rights won through political struggle, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the mass shooting. It is already political.

subs.text:
Will a Republican respond to pressure and change? Not readily.

But people ridiculed their empty “thoughts and prayers” tweets so hard that those are rare now. In recent tweets, new phrases serve a similar function.

So it is possible to get a Republican to use different words.
